mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(AH_METHOD),0) FROM AH WHERE AH_EPCODE = #{ah_epcode}
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(AH_METHOD),0) FROM AH WHERE AH_EPCODE = #{ah_epcode} and AH_PUBLICIP = #{ah_publicip} and AH_PRIVATEIP = #{ah_privateip} and AH_BROWSER = #{ah_browser}
SELECT AH_BROWSER||AH_PUBLICIP||AH_PRIVATEIP FROM(SELECT * FROM AH WHERE AH_EPCODE =#{ah_epcode} ORDER BY AH_DATE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AH (AH_METHOD, AH_DATE, AH_EPCODE, AH_PUBLICIP, AH_PRIVATEIP, AH_BROWSER) VALUES (#{ah_method}, sysdate, #{ah_epcode}, #{ah_publicip}, #{ah_privateip}, #{ah_browser})

INSERT INTO AH (AH_METHOD, AH_DATE, AH_EPCODE, AH_PUBLICIP, AH_PRIVATEIP, AH_BROWSER) SELECT -1, SYSDATE, AH_EPCODE, AH_PUBLICIP, AH_PRIVATEIP, AH_BROWSER FROM AH WHERE AH_DATE = (SELECT MAX(AH_DATE) FROM AH WHERE AH_EPCODE=#{ah_epcode}) and AH_METHOD = #{ah_method}
mapper.select: SELECT EP_CODE, EP_NAME, OF_CODE, OF_NAME, DP_CODE, DP_NAME, EP_EMAIL FROM EP INNER JOIN DP ON EP.EP_DPCODE=DP.DP_CODE INNER JOIN "OF" ON EP.EP_OFCODE = "OF".OF_CODE WHERE EP_CODE=#{epcode}
